entries.meaning: (teratology) A congenital malformation of the upper lip, reminiscent of the mouth of a hare.

verbs.description: harelip (third-person singular simple present harelips, present participle harelipping, simple past and past participle harelipped)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To curse (as if by causing a harelip),
examples: I don't care if it harelips the governor.
I'm gonna get them doors open if it harelips everybody on Bear Creek!
